entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
